headline: Eversource Named One of America’s Climate Leaders for 2025 by USA TODAY
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, April 25, 2025--For the third year in a row, Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) has been recognized by USA TODAY and Statista Inc. as one of America’s Climate Leaders for 2025. Ranked #1 among energy companies and utilities nationwide for the highest core emissions reduction year-over-year and ranked #146 overall, this recognition highlights Eversource’s continued achievements in prioritizing sustainability and environmental stewardship across its operations.
